Summary: TRIANGLE COMING AT ME FROM SW TURNED NEAR MY HOME TOWARDS THE EAST
divs: Sighting DetailsWAS ON PHONE WITH LAREDO PARANORMAL RESERCH HEAD HUNG UP RAISED MY NIGHT VISION GOGGLES AND THERE IT WAS HEADING TOWARDS ME I WATCHED IT BANK TOWARDS THE EAST TURNING ON ITS SIDE AND FADING AWAY .
